mapper.select: /*com.ntels.ccbs.charge.mapper.billing.billingAdjust.BillingBeforeAdjustMapper.getPymList*/ SELECT SO_ID ,CONCAT(PYM_ACNT_ID, ' ', ACNT_NM) AS PYM_ACNT ,PYM_ACNT_ID ,CUST_NM ,CUST_TP ,(SELECT NAME.CODE_NM AS COMMON_CD_NM FROM TSYCO_CODE_MAST MAST , TSYCO_CODE_MAST_NAME MNAME , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL DETAIL , TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME NAME WHERE MAST.COMMON_GRP=DETAIL.COMMON_GRP AND MAST.COMMON_GRP =MNAME.COMMON_GRP AND MNAME.LNG_TYP =#{billingBeforeAdjust.lngTyp} AND DETAIL.COMMON_GRP =NAME.COMMON_GRP AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD =NAME.COMMON_CD AND NAME.LNG_TYP =#{billingBeforeAdjust.lngTyp} AND MAST.COMMON_GRP ='CM00009' AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = CUST_TP ) AS CUST_TP_NM ,CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(PZIP_CD,' '), PBASE_ADDR), ' '),PADDR_DTL) AS ADDR FROM IFNBRM_CUST_INFO WHERE SO_ID = #{billingBeforeAdjust.soId} AND ACNT_NM = #{billingBeforeAdjust.custNm}

/* com.ntels.ccbs.charge.mapper.billing.billingAdjust.BillingBeforeAdjustMapper.getPymBillList */ SELECT '0' AS CHK_JOB , A.PYM_ACNT_ID /* 납부계정ID */ , A.PYM_ACNT_NM /* 납부자명 */ , A.CTRT_ID_CNT /* 계약ID */ , A.PROD_CD_CNT /* 상품건수 */ , A.SVC_CD_CNT /* 서비스건수 */ , B.ADJ_NO /* 조정일련번호 */ , B.BILL_SEQ_NO /* 청구일련번호 */ , IFNULL(B.ADJ_PT, '1') AS ADJ_PT /* 조정시점 1:청구전 2:청구후 */ , B.HOPE_APLY_YYMM /* 희망적용녀월 */ , B.DCSN_PROC_STAT /* 진행상태코드 */ ,(SELECT NAME.CODE_NM AS COMMON_CD_NM FROM TSYCO_CODE_MAST MAST ,TSYCO_CODE_MAST_NAME MNAME ,TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL DETAIL ,TSYCO_CODE_DETAIL_NAME NAME WHERE MAST.COMMON_GRP=DETAIL.COMMON_GRP AND MAST.COMMON_GRP =MNAME.COMMON_GRP AND MNAME.LNG_TYP ='ko' /* INPUT */ AND DETAIL.COMMON_GRP =NAME.COMMON_GRP AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD =NAME.COMMON_CD AND NAME.LNG_TYP ='ko' /* INPUT */ AND MAST.COMMON_GRP ='BL00055' AND DETAIL.COMMON_CD = B.DCSN_PROC_STAT ) AS DCSN_PROC_STAT_NM /* 진행상태 NM */ , IFNULL(B.ADJ_APPL_AMT,0) AS ADJ_APPL_AMT /* 신청금액 */ , IFNULL(B.HOPE_APLY_YYMM,'999999') AS ORDER_NUM /* ORDER BY */ , APPL_DTTM /* 신청일시 */ , RCPT_PSN_NM /* 접수자 */ , APPL_SO_NM /* 접수자소속 */ , A.SO_ID ,(SELECT SO_NM FROM TSYCO_SO_MAST WHERE SO_ID = A.SO_ID) AS SO_NM , B.APPRR_ID FROM ( SELECT PYM_ACNT_ID , PYM_ACNT_NM , COUNT(CTRT_ID) AS CTRT_ID_CNT , SUM(PROD_CD_CNT) AS PROD_CD_CNT , SUM(SVC_CD_CNT) AS SVC_CD_CNT , SO_ID FROM ( SELECT A1.PYM_ACNT_ID , A2.CUST_NM AS PYM_ACNT_NM , A3.CTRT_ID , A3.SO_ID , ( SELECT COUNT(Z.PROD_CMPS_ID) FROM TCMCT_PROD_CMPS_INFO Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.SO_ID = A3.SO_ID AND Z.CTRT_ID = A3.CTRT_ID AND Z.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' ) AS PROD_CD_CNT , ( SELECT COUNT(Z.SVC_CMPS_ID) FROM TCMCT_SVC_CMPS_INFO Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.SO_ID = A3.SO_ID AND Z.CTRT_ID = A3.CTRT_ID AND Z.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' ) AS SVC_CD_CNT FROM TCMCU_PYM_ACNT_INFO A1 , TCMCU_CUST_INFO A2 , TCMCT_CTRT_INFO A3 WHERE 1=1 AND A1.SO_ID = #{billingBeforeAdjust.soId} /* INPUT */ AND A1.PYM_ACNT_ID = #{billingBeforeAdjust.pymAcntId} /* INPUT */ AND A1.PYM_ACNT_ID = A3.PYM_ACNT_ID AND A1.CUST_ID = A2.CUST_ID AND A1.SO_ID = A2.SO_ID AND A2.SO_ID = A3.SO_ID AND A3.CTRT_STAT NOT IN ('10', '99' , '50', '90') AND A3.INACT_DTTM = '99991231235959' ) A GROUP BY PYM_ACNT_ID, PYM_ACNT_NM, SO_ID ) A LEFT JOIN ( SELECT X.ADJ_NO , X.BILL_SEQ_NO , X.ADJ_PT , X.PYM_ACNT_ID , X.HOPE_APLY_YYMM , X.DCSN_PROC_STAT , X.APPL_DTTM , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM TSYCO_USER X /* 사용자*/ WHERE X.USER_ID = X.RCPT_PSN_ID) AS RCPT_PSN_NM /* 접수자명 */ , (SELECT SUM(ADJ_APPL_AMT) FROM TBLIV_CHRG_ADJ_APLY_DTL /* 요금조정신청상세 */ WHERE ADJ_NO = X.ADJ_NO) AS ADJ_APPL_AMT /* 신청금액 */ , ( SELECT Y.SO_NM FROM TSYCO_SO_MAST Y /* SO 마스타*/ WHERE Y.SO_ID = X.APPL_SO_ID ) AS APPL_SO_NM /* 접수자소속 */ , X.APPRR_ID FROM TBLIV_CHRG_ADJ_APLY X /* 요금조정신청 */ WHERE 1=1 AND X.ADJ_PT = #{billingBeforeAdjust.adjPt} /* 조정시점(BLIV015, 1:청구전,2:청구후) */ UNION ALL SELECT NULL AS ADJ_NO , NULL AS BILL_SEQ_NO , #{billingBeforeAdjust.adjPt} AS ADJ_PT /* 조정시점(BLIV015, 1:청구전,2:청구후) */ , #{billingBeforeAdjust.pymAcntId} AS PYM_ACNT_ID /* INPUT */ , NULL AS HOPE_APLY_YYMM , NULL AS DCSN_PROC_STAT , NULL AS APPL_DTTM , NULL AS RCPT_PSN_NM , NULL AS ADJ_APPL_AMT , NULL AS APPL_SO_NM , NULL AS APPRR_ID FROM DUAL ) B ON A.PYM_ACNT_ID = B.PYM_ACNT_ID WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY HOPE_APLY_YYMM DESC
